channel.description: Submit a lifecycle management integration Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: + Bring the flow diagram from “Publish an OIN integration” to the top to help give it some direction. Split out the update section to Publish > Update your integration Links to original docs: ‘- Submit an LCM integration: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/submit-app/scim/main/ https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/submit-app-overview/ (Submission process for SSO integrations) Structure type: Task
